qml.name: qml

general.title: ENVIPE 2023 - MODULO DE VICTIMIZACION
general.creator: Instituto Nacional de Estadística y Geografía

query.name: qy_desc_delito
query.sql:
SELECT substr(delito, 1, length(delito)) delito FROM ( SELECT DELITO, '1' cod_especifique, #bpcod# codigo FROM TC_ENVIPE_DELITOS WHERE ID_ENVIPE_DELITO = CAST(#bpcod# as number) AND ID_ENVIPE_DELITO NOT IN (6,15) UNION SELECT AP7_3_06_01E delito, '1' cod_especifique, '06' codigo FROM TR_ENVIPE2022_ELEG WHERE PROG = #prog# AND UPM = #upm# AND VIV_SEL = #viv_sel# AND HOGAR = #hogar# AND ID_MUESTRA = #id_muestra# UNION SELECT AP7_3_06_02E delito, '2' cod_especifique, '06' codigo FROM TR_ENVIPE2022_ELEG WHERE PROG = #prog# AND UPM = #upm# AND VIV_SEL = #viv_sel# AND HOGAR = #hogar# AND ID_MUESTRA = #id_muestra# UNION SELECT AP7_3_06_03E delito, '3' cod_especifique, '06' codigo FROM TR_ENVIPE2022_ELEG WHERE PROG = #prog# AND UPM = #upm# AND VIV_SEL = #viv_sel# AND HOGAR = #hogar# AND ID_MUESTRA = #id_muestra# UNION SELECT AP7_3_06_04E delito, '4' cod_especifique, '06' codigo FROM TR_ENVIPE2022_ELEG WHERE PROG = #prog# AND UPM = #upm# AND VIV_SEL = #viv_sel# AND HOGAR = #hogar# AND ID_MUESTRA = #id_muestra# UNION SELECT AP7_3_06_05E delito, '5' cod_especifique, '06' codigo FROM TR_ENVIPE2022_ELEG WHERE PROG = #prog# AND UPM = #upm# AND VIV_SEL = #viv_sel# AND HOGAR = #hogar# AND ID_MUESTRA = #id_muestra# UNION SELECT AP7_3_15_01E delito, '1' cod_especifique, '15' codigo FROM TR_ENVIPE2022_ELEG WHERE PROG = #prog# AND UPM = #upm# AND VIV_SEL = #viv_sel# AND HOGAR = #hogar# AND ID_MUESTRA = #id_muestra# UNION SELECT AP7_3_15_02E delito, '2' cod_especifique, '15' codigo FROM TR_ENVIPE2022_ELEG WHERE PROG = #prog# AND UPM = #upm# AND VIV_SEL = #viv_sel# AND HOGAR = #hogar# AND ID_MUESTRA = #id_muestra# UNION SELECT AP7_3_15_03E delito, '3' cod_especifique, '15' codigo FROM TR_ENVIPE2022_ELEG WHERE PROG = #prog# AND UPM = #upm# AND VIV_SEL = #viv_sel# AND HOGAR = #hogar# AND ID_MUESTRA = #id_muestra# UNION SELECT AP7_3_15_04E delito, '4' cod_especifique, '15' codigo FROM TR_ENVIPE2022_ELEG WHERE PROG = #prog# AND UPM = #upm# AND VIV_SEL = #viv_sel# AND HOGAR = #hogar# AND ID_MUESTRA = #id_muestra# UNION SELECT AP7_3_15_05E delito, '5' cod_especifique, '15' codigo FROM TR_ENVIPE2022_ELEG WHERE PROG = #prog# AND UPM = #upm# AND VIV_SEL = #viv_sel# AND HOGAR = #hogar# AND ID_MUESTRA = #id_muestra#)
WHERE codigo = #bpcod# AND cod_especifique = #bpcod_opc#

query.name: qy_municipios
query.description: Obtiene los municipios de la entidad seleccionada
query.sql: select id_municipio, municipio from TC_C_MUNICIPIOS where id_entidad = #bp1_2c# or id_entidad='99'

query.name: qy_var_control
query.description: Obtiene el nombre de la persona elegida y la respuesta que dio en la pregunta 3.10 en el cuestionario sociodemogr�fico
query.sql: select nombre, b.ap3_10 from tr_envipe2022_sdg_int a left join (select id_muestra, max(ap3_10) ap3_10 from tr_envipe2022_sdg_int where id_muestra = #id_muestra# and ap3_10 in (3,4) group by id_muestra) b on a.id_muestra = b.id_muestra where a.codigo = 1 and a.n_ren = #num_ren# and a.id_muestra = #id_muestra#

labelfield.name: lbl122246543
labelfield.text: CM1: A continuación, le preguntaré por el

labelfield.name: lbl122246609
labelfield.text: #tr_envipe2023_modulo_c.desc_delito# sufrido en el 2022. Es muy importante que usted recuerde lo sucedido en relación con este delito.
